title: Fungi
creator_credit: John Walker, William M. Harlow and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: Defines fungi as simple plants dependent upon other organism for food. Illustrates how fungi grow and obtain their food. Explains their importance as a source of good, as agents in food processing and as a cause for disease in plants and animals.
